root.name: Angelica Weaver: Catch Me When You Can
root.description: OverviewAngelica Weaver: Catch Me When You Can is a hidden object game developed and published by MumboJumbo for the PC and Mac platforms.System RequirementsPCOperating System: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8CPU: 1.6 GHzRAM: 1024 MBDirectX: 9.0Hard Drive Space: 1144 MBMacOperating System: 10.8/10.7/10.6CPU: 1.6 GHz (Intel Only)RAM: 1024 MBHard Drive Space: 470 MB
